title: The Best is Saved for Last - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Aristocracy   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Older Love Interests   Priestesses   R-18   Royalty   Transported to Another World
author: Hinata Sora   日向そら
description: It’s been a year since I was transported into another world. After being officially dubbed as “useless,” I was thrown out of the royal palace…is what should have happened.>
